official_title: Commending Sonora Smart Dodd for her contribution in recognizing the importance of Father's Day and recognizing the important role fathers play in our families.

summary.text: Commends Sonora Smart Dodd for her contribution in recognizing the importance of Father's Day. Recognizes the important role fathers play in our families.
